page.title: 15LAKE MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: The school day starts at 8.55am and about 350 children aged beetween 9-13 troop into the middle school and to their form classes. There are on average 28 to 33 children in each class.A child collects the register from the hall and gives it to the form teacher.The bell rings again and all the children go into the hall for assembly.Assembly usually consists of a story read by the children or one of the teachers.Then we all go into our classes.There are many different lessons,Maths,English,French,Games, Music,Home Economics,R.E,Science and Integrated Studies. Break is at 10.30 and lunch is at 11.55 until 12.55.Dinners cost 65p. The school day ends at 3.25 and the children rush out to the buses , their bikes or to walk home.
